target_markets.market_description: AI automation agency owners and business owners who want to build AI agents without coding
pain_points: everyone wants to make money with AI but not everyone knows how to code
can't take GPTs out of OpenAI platform
businesses want AI agents on their websites, WhatsApp, Instagram
target_markets.market_size_indicators: described as 'one of the most in demand AI Solutions in the market right now'

problems_validated.problem: People want to make money with AI but lack coding skills
problems_validated.severity: significant enough to invest $200,000 over 8 months to solve
problems_validated.current_solutions: OpenAI GPTs that are limited to their platform
problems_validated.market_gap: can't deploy GPTs to websites, WhatsApp, Instagram - they're stuck in the GPT platform

products_tools.name: Agentive
products_tools.use_case: no-code platform for building, deploying and managing text-based AI agents

products_tools.name: OpenAI Assistant API
products_tools.pricing: usage-based billing, $5-10 credits recommended to start
products_tools.metrics: requires API key and billing setup

products_tools.name: Airtable
products_tools.use_case: capturing and storing lead information from AI agents

business_strategies.strategy: Build and sell text-based AI agents for businesses, particularly website lead generation agents
business_strategies.implementation: Use Agentive platform to rapidly build agents and deploy them to client websites
business_strategies.expected_results: immediate selling capability after building agents
business_strategies.case_study: Solar company lead generation agent example

business_strategies.strategy: Target AI automation agency owners with a free no-code platform
business_strategies.implementation: Provide free access to remove barriers to entry
business_strategies.expected_results: rapid adoption and user base growth

problems_solutions.problem: Building AI agents requires coding skills that many entrepreneurs lack
problems_solutions.solution: Use Agentive no-code platform to build agents with three ingredients: prompting, knowledge base, and tools
steps: Set up agent with custom prompt
Deploy to website with one click

problems_solutions.problem: OpenAI GPTs can't be deployed outside their platform
problems_solutions.solution: Agentive builds on top of Assistant API to enable deployment to websites, WhatsApp, Instagram
steps: Integrate with website or messaging platform

startup_ideas.idea: AI automation agency focused on website lead generation agents
startup_ideas.target_market: Solar companies and other service businesses needing lead generation
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Businesses need 24/7 lead capture and qualification on their websites
startup_ideas.business_model: Build and sell custom AI agents to businesses
startup_ideas.validation: High demand for AI solutions mentioned as market validation
startup_ideas.investment_needed: minimal - platform is free to use

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not setting up API usage limits and budgets
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Getting a nasty bill at the end of the month from OpenAI usage
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Set monthly budget limits ($30 suggested) and notification thresholds ($20 suggested) in OpenAI platform
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Platform settings allow project-level budget controls

growth_tactics.tactic: Create detailed tutorial videos showing exact step-by-step implementation
steps: Provide free access to remove barriers
Include all setup steps in detail
Set up custom prompt as solar expert
Visitors interact and provide contact info
ai_workflows.use_case: 24/7 lead qualification and capture for service businesses

metrics_kpis.benchmark: $30 per month budget suggested for beginners
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: OpenAI platform billing dashboard with notification thresholds
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use cheaper models and set up budget alerts at $20

trends_signals.trend: High demand for deployable AI agents outside of platform silos
trends_signals.opportunity: Businesses want AI agents integrated into their existing customer touchpoints
Democratizing AI agent creation for non-technical entrepreneurs

actionable_quotes.quote: everyone wants to make money with AI but not everyone knows how to code and this is a problem
